column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////For future reference
column2: please know that should you ever order anything you do not enjoy
column3: please send it back. We will do everything in our power to make it right for you. That said
column4: Jinya will never be all things to all people. Â No restaurant is able to do that. However
column5: we strive to achieve the highest standards each and every day in hopes of being the best at what we do.
